subject: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Beneficiary
I'm Dr Nelson James, The Director UPS Courier Service , i have
contacted you several times for the claim of your $2.5million dollars
that was in your name and since then we have not heard from you again
and Mr John Williams has reported to this office that you have given
an Authorization letter to him to claim your ATM Card worth of
$2.5million dollars as your next of kin .
Here is my question : Do you give Authorization letter to Mr John
Williams to claim your fund as your Next Of Kin ?
you have only 3 working days to comply with me 
or i will give an
approval to his request as my question here is why do  you give
Authorization letter to Mr John Williams to claim your fund as your
Next Of Kin ?
Note , the person in quote as your next of kin is willing to pay the
$25 shipping fee to claim your $2.5 million contest fund as your next
of kin, he said you died in a motor accident three days ago that is
why you never responds to pay the $25 fee and claim the fund.
If I don't hear from you within the next 3 working days, I'll assume
his claims were true and process the claim fee documents on his behalf
and deliver the fund to him.
I also want you to reconfirm your full delivery address to me once
again to avoid wrong delivery.
1. Your Name
2. House/delivery address/country
3. Phone number
4. Age
5. Any identification
6. Nearest Airport
Kindly do this immediately you receive this message so that I can
proceed to send your parcel to you as soon as possible.
I await your urgent response but if you are not interested in
receiving the parcel, please do not reply back.
Yours
remain bless as you comply
Dr Nelson James
D/line and WhatsAPP +23409122114518

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Nelson James, thank you for reaching out to me regarding the claim of my dollars. I appreciate your diligence in following up on this matter. Can you please provide more details about the process for claiming the funds and how I can ensure a smooth delivery?

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
If you dont want this fund to be cancelled in your name , kindly send the $25 apple gift card immediately you receive this message to enable us commence your delivery as scheduled

meanwhile try to reconfirm your full information to avoid mistake

i will be waiting to receive the card today
remain blessed
Dr Nelson James

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more details about the fund and the delivery process? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
We have finalize every arrangement on how to commence your delivery immediately as soon as you send this needed $25 shipping fee  through apple gift card


meanwhile I also want you to reconfirm your full delivery address to me once again to avoid wrong delivery.

1. Your Name
2. House/delivery address/country
3. Phone number
4. Age
5. Any identification
6. Nearest Airport

Kindly do this immediately you receive this message so that I can proceed to send your parcel to you as soon as possible.

Yours
remain bless as you comply
Dr Nelson James
D/line and WhatsAPP +23409122114518

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Nelson James,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update on the delivery process. Could you please provide more details about the shipping fee and how it works with an Apple gift card? I want to ensure that everything is clear before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response so we can move forward with the delivery.

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body: Kindly follow simple instructions if you want to receive your fund

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello! I'm interested in learning more about how to receive the fund. Can you please provide me with the details on what steps I need to take?

Best wishes,
Marie

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body: I write to inform you that I have cancelled the fund in your name immediately and am going to release it to Mr John Williams as your next of kin because am not here for jokers like you so please do not contact me again thanks

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello, thank you for reaching out. Can you please provide more details about the fund that was cancelled in my name? I'm not sure what this is about and would like to understand the situation better.

Best wishes,
Marie
